sense.gloss: to get dark, to grow dark
to end (of a day, year, season, etc.), to come to an end, to close
to be sunk in (e.g. despair), to be lost in (e.g. thought), to be overcome with
dizziness (from standing up too fast), orthostatic syncope, lightheadedness, vertigo
to deceive, to blind the eyes of
to be dazzled by, to be dizzied by, to be disoriented by
to be lost in (greed, lust, etc.)

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑強↑↓つよ↓い↑光↑↓ひかり↓に↑目↑↓め↓が↑眩↑↓くら↓んだ。
sdata.e: He was dazzled by the bright light.

sdata.j: ↑疲労↑↓ひろう↓やら↑飢↑↓う↓えやらで↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑目眩↑↓めまい↓を↑感↑↓かん↓じた。
sdata.e: What with fatigue and hunger, he was faint.

sdata.j: ↑真昼↑↓まひる↓の↑太陽↑↓たいよう↓がテニスコートを↑目↑↓め↓も↑眩↑↓くら↓むほどに↑照↑↓て↓らしあげた。
sdata.e: The noonday sun beat down with dazzling brightness on the tennis court.

sdata.j: ↑外↑↓そと↓の↑陽光↑↓ようこう↓が↑眩↑↓まばゆ↓い↑分↑↓ぶん↓、↑屋敷↑↓やしき↓の↑中↑↓なか↓は↑仄暗↑↓ほのぐら↓い。
sdata.e: It was as gloomy inside the mansion as the sunlight was dazzling outside.

sdata.j: ↑寝転↑↓ねころ↓がると、↑天井↑↓てんじょう↓の↑照明↑↓しょうめい↓が↑思↑↓おも↓いの↑外↑↓ほか↓↑眩↑↓まぶ↓しい。
sdata.e: As I lay down to sleep, the ceiling lights were unexpectedly bright.

sdata.j: ↑眩↑↓まぶ↓しくて↑目↑↓め↓を↑開↑↓あ↓けられない。
sdata.e: It's so bright that I can't open my eyes.

words.gloss: to get dark, to grow dark
